title: recipes_New_England_Brown_Bread
text:
Title: New England Brown Bread.
.
Description: This simple recipe for a classic New England brown bread is sweetened with molasses and best of all, a bread machine does most of the work!.
.
Ingredients:.
- 1 cup water.
- 1 tablespoon water.
- 0.5 cup molasses.
- 1 tablespoon vegetable oil.
- 1 tablespoon white sugar.
- 1 teaspoon salt.
- 1 cup quick-cooking oats.
- 3 cups bread flour.
- 2.25 teaspoons bread machine yeast.
- 1 tablespoon quick-cooking oats, or to taste.
.
Instructions:.
- Place 1 cup plus 1 tablespoon water, molasses, oil, sugar, salt, 1 cup oats, bread flour, and yeast in a bread machine in the order listed. Run "Dough" cycle..
- Remove dough from the bread machine. Shape into a round loaf, tucking ends in underneath. Transfer to a baking sheet and cover loosely with lightly oiled plastic wrap. Let rise until puffy, about 30 minutes..
- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Uncover dough and sprinkle 1 tablespoon oats on top..
- Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 40 minutes..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 100 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 20 g.
fiberContent: 1 g.
proteinContent: 2 g.
saturatedFatContent: 0 g.
sodiumContent: 240 mg.
sugarContent: 10 g.
fatContent: 2 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 10 servings.
